scripts.migrate:db:local-to-prod: echo '⚠️  This will overwrite production data. Continue? (y/N)' && read -r confirm && if [ "$confirm" = "y" ] || [ "$confirm" = "Y" ]; then wrangler d1 export astro-payload-monorepo-boilerplate-prod --local --output=/tmp/local-export.sql && echo 'Export complete.
